name: After Midnight (616 GAMES)
description:
Camera: First Person.

Control: Mouse and Keyboard only.

Graphics: PSX graphics style, inspired by old ps1 games.

Duration: It depends a lot on the type of player, it's a game that requires a lot of exploration, but it's not very long.

Finals: Total of 4 endings.

Be our patron and have several benefits...
